move.title: move
move.description: Moves the specified actor to the specified location by following the path given. You can specify its walking speed, or use the default constants WALK, RUN, or SPRINT.

speed.title: speed
speed.description: The speed of the movement. The number can be a decimal, or you can use the default constants WALK, RUN, or SPRINT.

path.title: path
path.description: The path that the NPC walks in vector coordinates (x,y,z). This occurs in order.

spawn.title: spawn
spawn.description: Spawns the actor at a specified location. If the actor is already spawned in, this does nothing. This is in x,y,z format. Optionally, it can be in x,y,z,yaw,pitch format.

location.title: location
location.description: The location vector that the actor will spawn at (x,y,z,yaw,pitch).

focus.title: focus
focus.description: Makes the actor look at and keep looking at another actor specified. If the targeted actor is a blank field, or they're not spawned in, they will unfocus.

focused_actor.title: actor
focused_actor.description: The targeted actor variable ID for the actor to focus on.

look.title: look
look.description: Makes the actor look at the specified location or yaw/pitch within the specified amount of time. If the NPC has a focus target, it will be canceled.

rotation.title: rotation
rotation.description: The rotation that the NPC looks towards. This can either be in x,y,z format, or yaw,pitch format.

time.title: time
time.description: The time taken to turn towards the specified rotation. This is in SECONDS, and can be a decimal.

interpolation.title: interpolation
interpolation.description: The interpolation of the rotation. Valid interpolations: LINEAR, BELL_CURVE, BELL_CURVE_UPSIDE_DOWN.

lock.title: lock
lock.description: Toggles of the NPC locks into this look rotation. If they are locked, then they will look in this direction if they're moving. To cancel the lock, use, cancel_look

cancel_look.title: cancel_look
cancel_look.description: Cancels the NPC's look if they're locked into a look rotation.

teleport.title: teleport
teleport.description: Teleports the actor to the specified location. This is in x,y,z format. Optionally, it can be in x,y,z,yaw,pitch format.

play_head_animation.title: play_head_animation
play_head_animation.description: Plays the specified head animation for that NPC. Head animations affect the NPC's head rotation. If another head animation is in progress, this will override it.

swing_mainhand.title: swing_mainhand
swing_mainhand.description: Swings the actor's main hand if they have one. When this action is played, it will incur the specified amount of wait time between the swing. If you don't want there to be a wait time, put it as 0 or lower. This is in SECONDS and can be a decimal.

swing_offhand.title: swing_offhand
swing_offhand.description: Swings the actor's off hand if they have one. When this action is played, it will incur the specified amount of wait time between the swing. If you don't want there to be a wait time, put it as 0 or lower. This is in SECONDS and can be a decimal.

wait.title: wait
wait.description: Causes the actor script to wait the specified amount of time before continuing to execute actions. Any in-progress actions are not halted. This is in SECONDS and can be a decimal.

sit.title: sit
sit.description: Toggles sitting. If the NPC is currently moving, then they are unseated. The NPC will sit regardless if the boolean is true or false.

play_effects.title: play_effects
play_effects.description: Plays the specified effects at the specified location

location.description: The location where the effects are played. This is in x,y,z format.

effects.title: effects
effects.description: The effects to play at the location
